title: ranked game curse
body: started rank game. about to go into load screen. nothing happens. click onto riot symbol in tray which brings up client. say's orange reconnect button. presses it and it minimizes to try and doesn't load game. played 2 games before that, and guess what of course it happens for my ranked game. not only that the only way to fix this god forsaken problem is to re-install league. you'd think after 3 years of having this problem riot would have fixed it by now. but nope, same problem 3 years ago, still only the same way to fix. and to top it all off league's patching is so bad. forced to exit the client and guess what, even though i finished downloading the over 5 gig's of data, you'd think it would be still be on to your computer because patching is taking over 2 goddamned hours. WELL GUESS WHAT GUYS IT ISN'T. client starts it back over from the beginning. like what is the RIOT league of legends company even doing?

replies.body:
The issue you described is actually usually tied to a poor connection to our servers. Because of this, I strongly encourage you to work through the steps inside our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a preventative step that should prevent stuff like this from happening again.

If you encounter any further issues with this, please let me know.
